trans-unit.source: Represents a user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 表示要为其授予权限管理内容访问权限的用户或用户组。

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser> is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: 与其他<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>类型，<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser>只能是在完全信任应用程序中可用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Owner%2A> property to assign a variable of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Owner%2A>要分配此类型的变量的属性。

trans-unit.source: The user or group name.
trans-unit.target: 用户或用户组名称。

trans-unit.source: The method for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The user or group `name` is often in the form of an individual email address (such as johndoe@contoso.com) or an email distribution list (such as marketing@contoso.com).
trans-unit.target: 用户或组`name`通常是个人电子邮件地址的形式 (如johndoe@contoso.com) 或电子邮件分发列表 (如marketing@contoso.com)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this constructor to create a secure environment.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建安全的环境。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the "Anyone" <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> persona.
trans-unit.target: 获取“Anyone”<see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> 角色的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the "Anyone" <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> persona.
trans-unit.target: “Anyone”<see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> 角色的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AnyoneUser%2A> has <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Anyone".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AnyoneUser%2A> 具有<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>"内部"和<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>"任何人"。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" with <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Anyone" is granted rights during publishing, the authentication server will issue a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> to any request and will attach the license to the requesting user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>"内部"与<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>"任何人"在发布期间授予权限，则身份验证服务器将发出<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>到任何请求，并将附加到请求的用户的许可证。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 获取为 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> 构造函数指定的 <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> 构造函数指定的 <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" />。

trans-unit.source: The user instance to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要比较是否等效的用户实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> is equivalent to another given instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> 是否与另一个给定实例等效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" /> are the same for both this user and the given user; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" /> 对于此用户和给定用户是相同的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a computed hash code based on the user <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回基于用户 <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" /> 计算出的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A hash code computed from the user <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" />.
trans-unit.target: 基于用户 <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" /> 计算出的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the user is currently authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前是否已验证用户的身份。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is currently authenticated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前已验证用户的身份，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" /> until authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 在进行身份验证之前，默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The given user <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> is authenticated based on the given <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 给定的用户<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>进行身份验证基于给定<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After a user has been authenticated and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.IsAuthenticated%2A> is `true`, the user dialog and prompt to confirm authentication is no longer displayed when creating a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: 用户已经过身份验证后和<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.IsAuthenticated%2A>是`true`，用户对话框并提示确认身份验证不会再显示在创建时<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user or group name specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 获取为 <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> 构造函数指定的用户或用户组名称。

trans-unit.source: The user or group name specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> 构造函数指定的用户或用户组名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the "Owner" <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> persona.
trans-unit.target: 获取“Owner”<see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> 角色的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the "Owner" <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> persona.
trans-unit.target: “Owner”<see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> 角色的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.OwnerUser%2A> has <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Owner".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.OwnerUser%2A> 具有<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>"内部"和<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>"所有者"。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.OwnerUser%2A> is used by the server-side templates to give special rights to the content author or publisher when the protected document is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.OwnerUser%2A> 使用服务器端模板来创建受保护的文档时向提供特殊权限的内容的作者或发布者。
